title: Larry Kosilla (AMMO Auto Care)
description:
Larry Kosilla is one of the world's top detailers, founder of AMMO Autocare, and also one of Matt's oldest friends. We'll be talking about his new shop, his cars, cleaning cars, and probably drum up some hilarious stories from back in the day.

Wath his YouTube channel to learn EVERYTHING about cleaning/detailing: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYsa8SOy3TkoxI5D17s1u-w

https://www.ammonyc.com/

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @ammonyc

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/OINLZzPwIuw
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
